00063   void processOptions(UserServer userServer, const UMS_Data::ListSessionOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest)
00064   {
00065      boost::posix_time::ptime pt;
00066      size_t userIdSize = options->getUserId().size();
00067      bool listAll = options->isAdminListOption();
00068 
00069      if ((!userServer.isAdmin()) && (userIdSize!=0 || listAll)) {
00070        UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00071        throw e;
00072      }
00073 
00074      if(options->getMachineId().size()!=0) {
00075        //To check if the name of the machine is correct
00076        checkClientMachineName(options->getMachineId());
00077 
00078        sqlRequest = "SELECT vsessionid, userid, sessionkey, state, closepolicy, timeout, lastconnect,"
00079          "creation, closure, name from vsession, users, clmachine where vsession.users_numuserid=users.numuserid"
00080          " and vsession.clmachine_numclmachineid=clmachine.numclmachineid";
00081        addOptionRequest("name", options->getMachineId(), sqlRequest);
00082      }
00083 
00084      if(userIdSize!=0) {
00085        //To check if the user id is correct
00086        checkUserId(options->getUserId());
00087 
00088        addOptionRequest("userid", options->getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00089      } else {
00090             if(!listAll) {
00091                addOptionRequest("userid", userServer.getData().getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00092             }
00093      }
00094 
00095      int status = options->getStatus();
00096      //To check the status value
00097      checkStatus(status);
00098 
00099      addIntegerOptionRequest("state", status, sqlRequest);
00100 
00101      int closePolicy = options->getSessionClosePolicy();
00102      //To check the closePolicy value
00103      checkClosePolicy(closePolicy);
00104 
00105      if(closePolicy) {
00106        addIntegerOptionRequest("closepolicy", closePolicy, sqlRequest);
00107      }
00108 
00109      int timeOut = options->getSessionInactivityDelay();
00110      if(timeOut < 0) {
00111        throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_INCORRECT_TIMEOUT);
00112      }
00113      if(timeOut) {
00114        addIntegerOptionRequest("timeout", timeOut, sqlRequest);
00115      }
00116 
00117      if(options->getSessionId().size()!=0) {
00118        //To check if the session id is correct
00119        checkSessionId(options->getSessionId());
00120 
00121        addOptionRequest("vsessionid", options->getSessionId(), sqlRequest);
00122      }
00123 
00124      time_t startDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getStartDateOption());
00125      if(startDate!=-1) {
00126        pt =  boost::posix_time::from_time_t(startDate);
00127        std::string startDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(pt);
00128        addTimeRequest("creation", startDateStr, sqlRequest, ">=");
00129      }
00130 
00131      time_t endDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getEndDateOption());
00132      if(endDate!=-1) {
00133        pt =  boost::posix_time::from_time_t(endDate);
00134        std::string endDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(pt);
00135        addTimeRequest("closure", endDateStr, sqlRequest, "<=");
00136      }
00137 
00138   }

00146   UMS_Data::ListSessions* list()
00147   {
00148     std::string sqlListOfSessions = "SELECT vsessionid, userid, sessionkey, state, closepolicy, timeout, lastconnect, "
00149     "creation, closure from vsession, users where vsession.users_numuserid=users.numuserid";
00150 
00151     std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00152     std::vector<std::string> results;
00153     UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00154     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListSessions();
00155 
00156     //Creation of the object user
00157     UserServer userServer = UserServer(msessionServer);
00158     userServer.init();
00159     //if the user exists
00160     if (userServer.exist()) {
00161 
00162       processOptions(userServer, mparameters, sqlListOfSessions);
00163       sqlListOfSessions.append(" order by creation");
00164 
00165       //To get the list of sessions from the database
00166       boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> ListOfSessions (mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListOfSessions.c_str()));
00167 
00168       if (ListOfSessions->getNbTuples() != 0){
00169         for (size_t i = 0; i < ListOfSessions->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00170           results.clear();
00171           results = ListOfSessions->get(i);
00172           ii = results.begin();
00173 
00174             UMS_Data::Session_ptr session = ecoreFactory->createSession();
00175             session->setSessionId(*(ii));
00176             session->setUserId(*(++ii));
00177             session->setSessionKey(*(++ii));
00178             session->setStatus(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00179             session->setClosePolicy(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00180             session->setTimeout(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00181             session->setDateLastConnect(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00182             session->setDateCreation(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00183             session->setDateClosure(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00184 
00185             mlistObject->getSessions().push_back(session);
00186         }
00187       }
00188     }
00189     else {
00190       UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USER);
00191       throw e;
00192     }
00193     return mlistObject;
00194   }
